text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Hm, something's off... Maybe her<n>nose needs to be
positioned higher...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I spot Mejiro Dober sitting in a corner<n>in the academy
library. She wears a<n>concentrated look on her face, and<n>
she seems to be drawing something.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: No good. I should probably go back to<n>the outline.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Let's erase this... Oh!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her arm slips as she applies vigorous<n>force toward erasing
the contents of<n>the page, and she knocks some<n>stationery
supplies onto the ground.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Oh sheesh, now I've done it...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I lean down and pick up the notebook<n>that had slipped onto
the floor. It's<n>open to a page with an illustration of<n>an
anime character.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: It's the main heroine of thelong-running kids' anime VeggieCaroline. The notebook seems tobe filled with similar such practiceillustrations.
choice_data_list: I'll put this over here.
I'll put this over here.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Oh, Trainer. Thanks...
choice_data_list: That Caroline illustration is really good.
That Caroline illustration is really cute.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Oh, Trainer. Thank you for the help.
choice_data_list: That Caroline illustration is really good.
That Caroline illustration is really cute.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: H-hey! Don't you dare look!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Uh... D-did you see that?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I make the excuse that it was simply<n>due to the page being
open to that<n>spot.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I make the excuse that it was simply<n>due to the page being
open to that<n>spot.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: You must think it looks pretty awful,<n>don't you?
choice_data_list: Not at all.
I don't think so.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: I know, I know... It doesn't look<n>anything like her.
choice_data_list: Not at all.
I don't think so.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The character's eyes overflow with a<n>sparkly
confidence—hope for the<n>future.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The character's eyes overflow with a<n>sparkly
confidence—hope for the<n>future.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her expression looks kind, and I tell<n>her that Caroline has
the kind of<n>stylish eyelashes you don't normally<n>see on
an anime character.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: You aren't... making fun of me, right?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Geez, you don't have to go that far.<n>I'm glad that you like
my drawing,<n>though.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I tend to draw in more of a shojo<n>manga style... I'm well
aware that it<n>doesn't really resemble her.
choice_data_list: It's really cute!
It's really cute!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I tend to draw in more of a shojo<n>manga style. It's kind of a
habit at this<n>point.
choice_data_list: It's really cute!
It's really cute!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Oh come on, knock it off already!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Oh come on, you're embarrassing<n>me!

text_block_list.name: Student A
text_block_list.text: Ahem... Please lower your voice in the<n>library.

text_block_list.name: Student A
text_block_list.text: Ahem... Please lower your voice in the<n>library.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
See? We got yelled at. Come on,<n>Trainer. It's almost time
for today's<n>session.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As we walk over toward the training<n>staff room, I decide to
ask her a<n>question out of curiosity.
choice_data_list: Are you a fan of "Veggie Caroline"?
Are you a fan of "Veggie Caroline"?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: I mean... I watched it when I was a<n>kid.
choice_data_list: But you draw the characters quite a lot, right?
But you draw the characters quite a lot, right?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I wouldn't go that far... I just watched<n>it a lot as a kid. You
recognized the<n>character, so I'm guessing it's the<n>same
for you.
choice_data_list: But you draw the characters quite a lot, right?
But you draw the characters quite a lot, right?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: It's just a coincidence. I simply like<n>to draw.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
It's just a way to pass the time. I do<n>love drawing quite a
lot, but the<n>characters are just coincidental.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I could draw characters from many<n>other anime if I wanted
to!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I happened to catch it on TV recently,<n>so the urge to draw
them kind of just<n>struck.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Though she says this, I can't help but<n>recall the face that
she was making<n>while she was drawing.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Though she says this, I can't help but<n>recall the face that
she was making<n>while she was drawing.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
At first I thought that it was something<n>that she had to do,
but if it's simply<n>one of her hobbies...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I just know that I would face a repeat<n>of that scrimmage
race if I just let<n>things be, however.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I just know that I would face a repeat<n>of that scrimmage
race if I just let<n>things be, however.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
So I was thinking that talking to you<n>could be some good
mental training<n>for me! You can do that much as my<n>
assistant trainer, right?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
So I was hoping... maybe I could talk<n>with you to help me
build some mental<n>fortitude. Would that be okay?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It seems she may still feel rather<n>uneasy about opening up
about her<n>personal interests, to say the least<n>about any
worries she may have.
choice_data_list:
If anything is ever troubling you, I'm always here
to help.

If anything is ever troubling you, I'm always here
to help.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It seems she may still feel rather<n>uneasy about opening up
about her<n>personal interests, to say the least<n>about any
worries she may have.
choice_data_list:
If anything is ever troubling you, I'm always here
to help.

If anything is ever troubling you, I'm always here
to help.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Huh? Ah... okay. I'll remember that.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Oh, thank you. Right, it's<n>probably best to talk it over if<n>
something's bothering me.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Though we have yet to share more<n>than just a few words, I
do feel like<n>we've gotten a little better at<n>understanding
each other.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Though we have yet to share more<n>than just a few words, I
do feel like<n>we've gotten a little better at<n>understanding
each other.
